content: I think I'll create a dedicated segment in the playlist for our special songs. I'll title it "Our Story" and include the song from our first date, the song that was playing during our proposal, and a few other songs that are significant to our relationship. Do you think it's a good idea to include a song from my cousin's wedding, where my fiancé and I first met? It's a fun memory, but I'm not sure if it fits with the overall vibe of our wedding.
